main_definition: Mayor is a title given to the head of a city or town government, responsible for overseeing the administration and representing the community.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Title for the chief executive officer of a city or municipality
meanings_and_examples.example: The mayor of New York City is Bill de Blasio.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who holds this position
meanings_and_examples.example: Mayor Jane Smith was elected last year to serve her community as their leader.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The meeting of a city council where decisions are made and the mayor addresses attendees
meanings_and_examples.example: During the monthly council meeting, Mayor Johnson addressed key issues affecting the local residents.
